policy.executive_summary: The MCP toolchain scan revealed several un-pinned versions of packages across multiple servers, which poses a security risk due to potential vulnerabilities in outdated software. Additionally, while all servers require authentication, the capabilities granted may allow for excessive access to sensitive data. Immediate actions are required to pin package versions and ensure least privilege access.

prioritized_fixes.title: Pin Package Versions
prioritized_fixes.why_it_matters: Un-pinned versions can lead to the use of vulnerable software, increasing the risk of exploitation.
prioritized_fixes.exact_change: Pin all server package versions to the latest stable release.

prioritized_fixes.title: Review and Limit Capabilities
prioritized_fixes.why_it_matters: Excessive capabilities can lead to unauthorized access to sensitive data and operations.
prioritized_fixes.exact_change: Review capabilities for each server and limit them to only what is necessary.
